title: Nicely priced modern studio in Downtown area
posting_body: Pet-friendly apartment community in the South Congress neighborhood.
Be in the center of it all with easy access to the major shopping and entertainment district in downtown Austin.
Enjoy top-notch restaurants, great shopping and the best of Austin living.
The perfect home in the hippest locale is waiting for you!

This modern community offers accessible SoCo residences that delight with arts district vibrancy, located near the South Congress bridge for convenient commuting to downtown Austin, as well as Lady Bird Lake.
Revel in your new modern studio, designed with cool, contemporary finishes that compliments your active lifestyle.
Discover how much of an impact a well-located apartment community can make in your life and take advantage of this major opportunity.
Christena Barry - Award Winning Locator & Realtor
*Pics show general property, not necessarily particular unit.
